subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=61|rad=心|as=09|sn=12|four=|canj=PNSJ|ids=⿰[[忄]][[弭]]}}

# to [[arouse]] to [[action]], [[encourage]]
# to [[temper]] and [[grind]], to [[train]] or [[discipline]] [[oneself]] (toward a [[goal]])
# to [[sharpen]] (a [[knife]])
# to [[forge]]
# [[harden]]
# (same as [[弭]]) to [[stop]], to [[end]], [[eliminate]]
